Payment Gateway API Documentation

Complete documentation for payment integration

Introduction

Our payment gateway provides a robust solution for processing payments through PIX. This documentation will guide you through the integration process.

Note: Split functionality is only available for Cash In operations

Authentication

All API requests require an API key sent in the header

Request Headers 
Apikey: your-api-key-here

Endpoints

Cash In (PIX)

POST /cashin

Request Body

JSON 
{
  "nome": "John Doe",
  "cpf": "12345678900",
  "valor": "100.00",
  "descricao": "Payment description",
  "postback": "https://your-domain.com/webhook",
  "split": {
    "target": "recipient_id",
    "percentage": 50
  }
}

Optional split payment configuration (Cash In only)

Response

JSON 
{
  "statusCode": 200,
  "id": "e123...",
  "pix": "00020126...",
  "value": 100,
  "status": "PENDING"
}

Cash Out (PIX)

POST /cashout

Request Body

JSON 
{
  "nome": "John Doe",
  "cpf": "12345678900",
  "valor": "100.00",
  "descricao": "Payment description",
  "postback": "https://your-domain.com/webhook"
}

Response

JSON 
{
  "statusCode": 200,
  "id": "e123...",
  "pix": "00020126...",
  "value": 100,
  "status": "PENDING"
}

Webhook

POST /webhook

Receives transaction status updates

JSON 
{
  "type": "transaction",
  "data": {
    "id": "transaction-id",
    "status": "paid",
    "amount": 100
  }
}
